thread.title: Pete
thread.title_full: Right Channel Radios reviewed by Pete

author: Pete
title: Pete
text: Right Channel Radios is the place to get your CBs and CB accessories. Don't look anywhere else. The price is right and the experienced and knowledgeable staff can answer any question you throw at 'em! I purchased in the middle of the week and got it in time to install and have it ready for the trail ride that weekend (I'm glad I had it too. I needed it). Kudos to the Right Channel Radio staff and I'll definitely be buying from you in the future!
